contentList.content: Select [1] additional <LSTag Tooltip="Skill">Skills</LSTag> to be <LSTag Tooltip="Proficiency">Proficient</LSTag> in. All of your abilities are increased by [2].
Select [1] additional <LSTag Tooltip="Skill">Skills</LSTag> to be <LSTag Tooltip="Proficiency">Proficient</LSTag> in. All of your abilities are increased by [2].
Select [1] additional <LSTag Tooltip="Skill">Skills</LSTag> to be <LSTag Tooltip="Proficiency">Proficient</LSTag> in. All of your abilities are increased by [2].
Select [1] additional <LSTag Tooltip="Skill">Skills</LSTag> to be <LSTag Tooltip="Proficiency">Proficient</LSTag> in. All of your abilities are increased by [2].

You can cast <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_ViciousMockery">Vicious Mockery</LSTag> as a <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="BonusActionPoint">Bonus Action</LSTag>, and it deals additional damage equal to your <LSTag Tooltip="SpellcastingAbilityModifier">Spellcasting Modifier</LSTag>.
When you cast a damaging spell, add your <LSTag Tooltip="SpellcastingAbilityModifier">Spellcasting Modifier</LSTag> to the damage it deals.
